Title: Conference
Description: This is the web project based on Silverlight and WCF which provides the possibility of establishing sound- and video-connection between users directly on the web-page (in the Silverlight container). It's developed in C#.
HomeWiki:
This is the web project based on Silverlight and WCF which provides the possibility of establishing sound- and video-connection between users directly on the web-page (within Silverlight container). It's developed in C#.

Basically this project is a videochat, but right now it can be used without lags only for local networks because it needs high-speed connection between client and server.
